ModMetaData.name: No Auto Tree Cut
ModMetaData.author: synthe0n
ModMetaData.description:
Stop pawns automatically cutting trees and uproot them instead!
Stop pawns automatically cutting trees and uproot them instead!
Commissioned in the RimWorld Mod Market.
== Features ==
Replaces tree cutting jobs with extract jobs when a tree blocks building, roofing, or farming.
This behaviour can be changed using the provided mod settings.
== Future Plans ==
I plan to add support for automatically switching the behaviour based on pawn views / ideoligion and adjusting the available settings to switch the extraction behaviour between OFF, AUTO, and ON.
== Existing Saves ==
This mod should be safe to add or remove from saves.
